verses.text: And the king levied \add a tax\add* upon \add his\add* kingdom both by land and sea.
And \add as for\add* his strength and valor, and the wealth and glory of his kingdom, behold, they are written in the book of the Persians and Medes, for a memorial.
And Mordecai was viceroy to King Artaxerxes, and was a great man in the kingdom, and honored by the Jews, and passed his life beloved of all his nation.
